function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Echo chambers reinforcing particular political orientations and influencing views on pandemic measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of fear of authorities on compliance with pandemic measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for non-compliance with rules and requests","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher impulsivity predicting non-compliance","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of social norms on compliance","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative emotions leading to lower compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear rules leading to lower compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived capacity and knowledge affecting compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Concordance between self-report and objective compliance measures differs based on the method of assessment","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in compliance may be influenced by substantive moral support for measures and perception of costs and strain","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with stay at home and social distancing measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of moral appeals for compliance","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enforcement of sanctions for non-compliance","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Self-reported behavior studies may not capture the full extent of compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on de-identified cell-phone data to assess compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive studies on compliance factors for covid-19 mitigation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in sustaining long-term compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effectiveness of risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 aerosol stability","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surface stability of sars-cov-2 on plastic and
